name: Coronal Hypershunt
desc: A coronal hypershunt, downscaled by orders of magnitude, is integrated into the hull. It grants incredible power to an ARC ship, at the cost of drastic overload times as a result of the emergency shutdown needed to keep the internal wormhole from destabilizing and going supercritical.

name: Whitespace Core
desc: A unique, Archotech-designed modulation core fed from the hypershunt pinhole exploits tiny creases in the fabric of time to sheath the ship in a pocket of "whitespace".
short: Gives a base %s time dilation factor, which scales up to %s when the flux levels reach %s.

name: Polyceramite Laminate
desc: A lattice of shimmering twilight armor plates have been integrated into the ship. Each armor block is laminated with a continuously shifting coating rumored to be created by an Archotech AI.
